PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_DiscreteAccessoryLadderTrussConnector
PropertySetDef.Definition: Shape properties specific to connecting accessories in truss form with straight cross-bars in ladder shape.

PropertyDef.Name: LadderTrussHeight
PropertyDef.Definition: The overall height of the truss connector.

PropertyDef.Name: LadderTrussLength
PropertyDef.Definition: The overall length of the truss connector.

PropertyDef.Name: LadderTrussCrossBarSpacing
PropertyDef.Definition: The spacing between the straight cross-bars.

PropertyDef.Name: LadderTrussBaseBarDiameter
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal diameter of the base bar.

PropertyDef.Name: LadderTrussSecondaryBarDiameter
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal diameter of the secondary bar.

PropertyDef.Name: LadderTrussCrossBarDiameter
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal diameter of the straight cross-bars.
